page.title: 19LEISURE IN RUISLIP
page.content: There is a rugby pitch on West End Road in Ruislip. It is open on Sunday mornings for lessons. Tennis courts are at Bessingby playing fields and Church Field Gardens where you can have lessons in the holidays. There is a football club on Breakspear Road. There is a bowling green (on the old haystack yard of Ruislip Manor farm.) There is a municipal golf course and swimming pool.Park Wood is 100 hectares and is part of the original forest that covered SE England. It is now owned by Hillingdon Borough.The wood has a nature trail and has a good variety of flora and fauna.It is possible to go through the woods to Ruislip Lido where there is a beach and most water sports. There are many restaurants and public houses (several are mentioned by name in the 1851 census of the area.)
